name: Debt Securities, Current
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as current.

name: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Foreign
description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign operating loss carryforwards.

name: Effective Income Tax Rate Due to Deduction, Extraterritorial Income Exclusion, Percent
description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for extraterritorial income exclusion.
